mapper.select: select * from pboard order by pno desc
mapper.insert: insert into pboard (ptitle, pcontent, ptag, ppass, pname, pdate, peditdate, pip) values (#{ptitle}, #{pcontent}, #{ptag}, #{ppass}, #{pname}, #{pdate}, #{peditdate}, #{pip})
mapper.update: update pboard set ptitle=#{ptitle}, pcontent=#{pcontent}, ptag=#{ptag} where pno=#{pno} and ppass=#{ppass}
update pboard set pcnt=pcnt+1 where pno=#{pno}
mapper.delete: delete from pboard where pno=#{pno} and ppass=#{ppass}
